edu.umd.cs.psl.model.kernel

Class AbstractKernel

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umd.cs.psl.model.kernel.AbstractKernel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AtomEvent.Listener, Kernel, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractRuleKernel, DomainRangeConstraintKernel, SetDefinitionKernel, SymmetryConstraintKernel

    public abstract class AbstractKernel
extends java.lang.Object
implements Kernel
    Allows implementing Kernels to avoid keeping track of which GroundKernelStore to use when handling AtomEvents.

      • registerForAtomEvents

        public void registerForAtomEvents(AtomEventFramework eventFramework,
                         GroundKernelStore gks)
        Description copied from interface: Kernel
        Registers this Kernel to listen for the AtomEvents it needs to update a GroundKernelStore.

        Specifically, this Kernel will register for AtomEvents and update the GroundKernelStore in response to AtomEvents. In response to an AtomEvent on a RandomVariableAtom, the GroundKernelStore must contain the GroundKernels that are functions of it which would have been added via Kernel.groundAll(AtomManager, GroundKernelStore) given the current state of the AtomEventFramework's Database and assuming that the RandomVariableAtom was also persisted in the Database.

        Specified by:
        registerForAtomEvents in interface Kernel
        Parameters:
        eventFramework - AtomEventFramework to register with
        gks - GroundKernelStore to update in response to AtomEvents

      • unregisterForAtomEvents

        public void unregisterForAtomEvents(AtomEventFramework eventFramework,
                           GroundKernelStore gks)
        Description copied from interface: Kernel
        Stops updating a GroundKernelStore in response to AtomEvents from an AtomEventFramework and unregisters with that AtomEventFramework if it no longer needs to listen for AtomEvents from it.
        Specified by:
        unregisterForAtomEvents in interface Kernel
        Parameters:
        eventFramework - AtomEventFramework to unregister with
        gks - GroundKernelStore to stop updating

      • notifyAtomEvent

        protected abstract void notifyAtomEvent(AtomEvent event,
                   GroundKernelStore gks)
        Handles an AtomEvent using the specified GroundKernelStore.

        Kernels need to have registered to handle this event with an AtomEventFramework.

        Parameters:
        event - the AtomEvent that occurred
        gks - the GroundKernelStore to use

      • registerForAtomEvents

        protected abstract void registerForAtomEvents(AtomEventFramework eventFramework)
        Registers with a specific AtomEventFramework to handle atom events.

        Subclasses are expected to register for the same AtomEvents and Predicates at all times. Kernels that do not fit this behavior should not extend this class.

        Parameters:
        eventFramework - The event framework to register with

      • unregisterForAtomEvents

        protected abstract void unregisterForAtomEvents(AtomEventFramework eventFramework)
        Unregisters from a specific AtomEventFrameWork to no longer handle atom events.

        Subclasses are expected to have registered for the same AtomEvents and Predicates at all times. Kernels that do not fit this behavior should not extend this class.

        Parameters:
        eventFramework - The event framework to unregister from
